Articles.Content: I have KPS 1.0.4, dose this mean a mod from 1.0.2 or earler will not work? I love the look of some older mods and would like to try them out.

If it says 1.0.2 or 1.0 then it will most likely work without issue. If it says it's for 0.90 or before there is a decent chance it won't work, but check the last few pages of the forum threads first as people will usually test it out and report back about what works, what doesn't, and they might also include community-made fixes to get it working in the latest version.
ok buddy nice one, that will save me alot of time. Thanks.
